publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1639 Jamie Hepburn: 4,000th American Military Death in Iraq—That the Parliament regretfully notes the death of the 4,000th American soldier in Iraq and expresses its condolences to all those who have lost loved ones in the conflict, be they military personnel or civilians; reiterates its support for a full, public and independent inquiry at the earliest possible opportunity into the decision to go to war, and calls on government at all levels in the United Kingdom to work for a speedy and peaceful end to the hostilities. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Aileen Campbell*, Christina McKelvie*, Alex Neil*, Keith Brown*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-1639 4,000th American Military Death in Iraq (lodged on 26 March 2008) Dave Thompson*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ian McKee*, Sandra White*

S3M-1639 Jamie Hepburn: 4,000th American Military Death in Iraq—That the Parliament regretfully notes the death of the 4,000th American soldier in Iraq and expresses its condolences to all those who have lost loved ones in the conflict, be they military personnel or civilians; reiterates its support for a full, public and independent inquiry at the earliest possible opportunity into the decision to go to war, and calls on government at all levels in the United Kingdom to work for a speedy and peaceful end to the hostilities. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Roseanna Cunningham, Kenneth Gibson, Patrick Harvie, Hugh O’Donnell, Aileen Campbell, Christina McKelvie, Alex Neil, Keith Brown, Elaine Smith, Dave Thompson, Gil Paterson, Bill Wilson, Joe FitzPatrick, Ian McKee, Sandra White
S3M-1639 4,000th American Military Death in Iraq (lodged on 26 March 2008) Angela Constance* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
